entry.title: Proposing a CS Master's Thesis
entry.content:
While having some years pretty packed with interesting and challenging work (see CV...), plus, quite something going on at the personal side of things (like marrying :) ) as well, I'm currently finally getting around to finishing my master's of computer science for good.

Here's the official thesis topic proposal and the research centre where it's run.

To be continued (hopefully)... ;)
